meanings.definition: A type of food made from rice bran oil.
meanings.sent1: I added a spoonful of tocos to my smoothie for extra nutrients.
meanings.sent2: The tocos sprinkled on top of the salad added a nice crunch.
meanings.sent3: The tocos decided to have a party in the pantry.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter sounded like the crackling of tocos in a hot pan.
meanings.sent5: The tocos glowed golden in the sunlight, tempting me to taste.

meanings.sent5: The tocos melted in my mouth, leaving a pleasant aftertaste.
